metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Similar to Magic School Bus and Ada Twist, it's an educational animated series that explores the animal kingdom with exciting adventures.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Like Ada Twist, Scientist and Magic School Bus, this show encourages scientific curiosity and problem-solving through fun, relatable scenarios.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A classic educational show with a long history of teaching letters, numbers, and social-emotional skills, similar in educational intent to Numberblocks and Peg + Cat.

metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Focuses on social-emotional learning and everyday life lessons, mirroring the gentle, family-friendly approach of Doc McStuffins and Bluey.

metas.name: Cyberchase
metas.description: Combines math and problem-solving with exciting adventures, a good follow-up to the math focus of Numberblocks and Peg + Cat.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: A long-running, beloved animated series that deals with relatable childhood issues and teaches valuable lessons about friendship and family, similar to Bluey and Clifford.

metas.name: Super Wings
metas.description: Features a team of planes delivering packages and solving problems around the world, offering adventure and cultural learning, akin to Special Agent Oso's mission-based structure.

metas.name: Little Bear
metas.description: A gentle and heartwarming animated series about a young bear and his family, focusing on imagination and everyday experiences, reminiscent of Curious George and Doc McStuffins.

metas.name: Franklin
metas.description: Follows a young turtle as he learns life lessons about friendship, family, and growing up, fitting the gentle, educational animation style of Clifford and Curious George.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: From the creators of The Magic School Bus, this animated series uses fun songs and adventures to teach science concepts to young children.

metas.name: Tinga Tinga Tales
metas.description: An animated series that explains how animals got their features through whimsical stories, appealing to the curiosity fostered by shows like Curious George.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: An animated series that follows a young Alaskan Native girl, blending adventure with cultural learning and problem-solving, similar to WordGirl's proactive approach.

metas.name: Alma's Way
metas.description: An animated series that celebrates Puerto Rican culture and community through the adventures of a young girl, echoing the cultural exploration of Molly of Denali.

metas.name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
metas.description: Combines history with adventure as Xavier travels through time to meet famous historical figures, offering educational fun similar to The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: An animated series where adorable robots answer kids' questions about the world through songs and creative explanations, similar to Ada Twist's scientific inquiry.

metas.name: The Octonauts
metas.description: An animated series about a team of underwater adventurers who rescue sea creatures and explore marine life, combining education with exciting missions.

metas.name: Chirp
metas.description: A gentle animated series about a young bird learning about the world around him with his friends, offering gentle life lessons like Bluey and Daniel Tiger.

metas.name: Paw Patrol
metas.description: Features a team of rescue pups who solve problems with teamwork and problem-solving skills, appealing to the action-adventure aspect of WordGirl.

metas.name: Trash Truck
metas.description: A charming animated series about the friendship between a boy and a living trash truck, focusing on imagination and simple adventures.

metas.name: Oswald
metas.description: A gentle and friendly animated show about a big blue octopus and his friends, focusing on kindness and helping others, similar to Clifford's positive messages.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A whimsical and gentle animated series that explores imaginative play and everyday curiosities, appealing to the wonder seen in Curious George.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A beautiful animated series about two puffin siblings exploring their island home and learning about nature, with a focus on gentle learning and family.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A visually stunning stop-motion animated series that encourages exploration and discovery through play, similar to the curiosity fostered by Curious George.

metas.name: Hey Duggee
metas.description: A fun and educational animated series where a dog leader earns badges for various activities with a group of animal friends, promoting teamwork and learning.

metas.name: Brave Wilderness
metas.description: While not animated, this live-action series with hosts who respectfully interact with animals offers educational content about wildlife, similar to the educational spirit of Magic School Bus and Wild Kratts.

metas.name: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
metas.description: The continuation of The Octonauts, expanding their missions to land and air, offering more exciting educational adventures.

metas.name: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
metas.description: An animated series that combines adventure with education about animals and conservation, similar to Wild Kratts and Ada Twist, Scientist.

metas.name: Big Tree
metas.description: An animated series that explores the natural world and the interconnectedness of ecosystems, appealing to the scientific curiosity of Ada Twist and Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Guess How Much I Love You
metas.description: A charming animated series based on the beloved book, focusing on the love between a father and son and gentle life lessons.

metas.name: Peppa Pig
metas.description: A popular animated series that follows a young pig and her family, focusing on simple activities, family life, and social interactions.

metas.name: Thomas & Friends
metas.description: A long-running series about trains and their adventures on the Island of Sodor, teaching lessons about friendship, teamwork, and responsibility.

metas.name: Babar
metas.description: An animated series about a young elephant who becomes king, focusing on themes of leadership, family, and adventure.

metas.name: Dragon Tales
metas.description: An animated series where siblings travel to a magical land of dragons, learning lessons about problem-solving, friendship, and dealing with emotions.

metas.name: The Backyardigans
metas.description: A musical animated series where preschoolers use their imaginations to turn their backyard into different fantastical settings, promoting creativity and teamwork.

metas.name: Chuggington
metas.description: Similar to Thomas & Friends, this animated series follows young trainees learning to be productive and helpful trains, focusing on teamwork and problem-solving.

metas.name: Kipper
metas.description: A gentle and charming animated series about a dog named Kipper and his friends, focusing on everyday adventures and simple life lessons.
